name: Time Loop (HackLord Monster)
description:
You go on a flight in a jet, and get stuck in a corrupted infinite 4 dimentional channel and have to avoid time junk. But, every few seconds (or years. You can never know), the time will go back and you will have to remember the order of the junk.

In the game you will spawn as a lost jet in a time channel, with time junk in 3 positions. The junk is numbered to help you remember the order of the junk. After you go through all of the junk the time will go back, and you will have to remember the reversed order.

Keys:
w and s or up and down arrows - move up and down
esc - return to the main menu

have fun! (and tell me your hs ;))

note its one of my first games so it's pretty basic and i probably forgot a few things
